generated.css: .global-cursor{width:100%;height:100%;mix-blend-mode:difference;z-index:999;position:relative;pointer-events:none}.global-cursor .global-cursor-container{position:absolute;pointer-events:none;opacity:0;transition:opacity .9s cubic-bezier(.54,.1,0,.99)}.global-cursor .global-cursor-container .global-cursor-main{position:relative;width:4rem;height:4rem}.global-cursor .global-cursor-container .global-cursor-main .global-cursor-dot{position:absolute;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;width:.8rem;height:.8rem;border-radius:50%;background:#fff}.global-cursor .global-cursor-container .global-cursor-main .global-cursor-dot .cursor-dot-text{display:inline-block;width:200%;height:200%;font-family:Heebo,sans-serif;font-size:.3rem;line-height:1.7rem;font-weight:400;transform:scale(.5);text-align:center;flex-shrink:0}.global-cursor .global-cursor-container .global-cursor-main .global-cursor-svg{position:absolute;width:4rem;height:4rem}.global-cursor .global-cursor-container .global-cursor-main .global-cursor-svg .global-cursor-circle{fill:none;stroke-width:1px;stroke:hsla(0,0%,100%,.5);stroke-dasharray:11rem;stroke-dashoffset:0}.global-cursor .global-cursor-container .global-cursor-main .global-cursor-svg .circle-shock-wave{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;border-radius:50%;background:#fff;transform:scale(0);opacity:0}.global-cursor .global-cursor-container .global-cursor-main .global-cursor-svg .circle-shock-wave.is-draggable{animation:shock-wave-draggable-infinite 1.5s ease-out infinite forwards}.global-cursor .global-cursor-container .global-cursor-main .global-cursor-svg .circle-shock-wave.is-clickable{animation:shock-wave-button-infinite 1.5s ease-out infinite forwards}@keyframes shock-wave-draggable-infinite{0%{visibility:visible;transform:scale(0);opacity:.5}50%{visibility:visible;transform:scale(3);opacity:0}to{visibility:visible;transform:scale(3);opacity:0}}@keyframes shock-wave-button-infinite{0%{visibility:visible;transform:scale(0);opacity:.5}50%{visibility:visible;transform:scale(1.5);opacity:0}to{visibility:visible;transform:scale(1.5);opacity:0}}
